summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical underground distribution easements over portions of Richmond Acres; Golfcrest; Lake Forest Park Estates; Cormode's 5 Acre Garden Tracts; Thormod's Addition; Stimson Park Division No. 1; Echo Lake Garden Tracts, Fifth Division; Hillman's Garden Tracts; Echo Lake Suburban Tracts; and Assessor's Plat of Endolyne, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
